description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Bacon Rice Balls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheesy Bacon Rice Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using a slotted spoon gently place 4 or 5 rice balls at a time into the oil and fry for 8-10 minutes or until golden. Lay them on sheets of paper towel to absorb any excess oil.
